text: He nabi, taderake bale da'o, yara tomara hate bandi haye ache ye, allaha yadi tomadera antare kona rakama mangalacinta rayeche bale janena, tabe tomaderake tara ceye bahuguna besi dana karabena ya tomadera kacha theke binimaye neya hayeche. Tachara tomaderake tini ksama kare dibena. Bastutah allaha ksamasila, karunamaya.
